title: Ayyavazhi
summary: Ayyavazhi (Tamil: அய்யாவழி, Malayalam: അയ്യാവഴി Ayyāvaḻi[1] [əjːaːvəɻi] (listen), "Path of the Master") is a henotheistic belief[2] that originated in South India.[3] It is cited as an independent monistic religion[4] by several newspapers,[5][6] government reports,[7][8] and academic researchers.[9][10][11]
